entities.name: Harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is sitting in class and trying to answer questions.

entities.name: Hermione
entities.description: A student in Harry's class, whose handwriting is mentioned as writing a heading about the International Confederation of Wizards.

entities.name: Parvati Patil
entities.description: Another student in Harry's class, who has long dark hair and is sitting behind Harry.

entities.name: Professor Marchbanks
entities.description: A teacher in the class where Harry is sitting, whose desk has an hourglass on it.

relationships.description: Harry had read notes from Hermione about the International Confederation of Wizards.
Harry is sitting behind Parvati Patil in class.
